teetime.framework.pipe

Class PipeFactoryRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • teetime.framework.pipe.PipeFactoryRegistry

  • public final class PipeFactoryRegistry
extends Object
    Represents a Registry which provides PipeFactories that are used to create pipes. The instance of this singleton class is saved in INSTANCE.

    To get a PipeFactory instance, call getPipeFactory(ThreadCommunication, PipeOrdering, boolean).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PipeFactoryRegistry.PipeOrdering
      Represents the ordering behavior of a pipe
      static class  PipeFactoryRegistry.ThreadCommunication
      Represent a communication type between two connected stages

    • Field Detail

      • INSTANCE

        public static final PipeFactoryRegistry INSTANCE
        The singleton instance of PipeFactoryRegistry

    • Method Detail

      • getPipeFactory

        public IPipeFactory getPipeFactory(PipeFactoryRegistry.ThreadCommunication tc,
                          PipeFactoryRegistry.PipeOrdering ordering,
                          boolean growable)
        Returns a PipeFactory Instance.
        Parameters:
        tc - Communication type between two connected stages. These are defined in PipeFactoryRegistry.ThreadCommunication
        ordering - Specifies the ordering behavior of the pipe. See PipeFactoryRegistry.PipeOrdering
        growable - Whether the queue size is fixed or not.
        Returns:
        A PipeFactory, which provides suitable pipes.

      • register

        public void register(IPipeFactory pipeFactory)
        Adds a new PipeFactory to the registry.
        The new PipeFactory will be automatically selected by the Registry, if it is the most suitable Factory corresponding to the requirements.
        Parameters:
        pipeFactory - A PipeFactory which will be added to the registry
